I am using Code Contracts for my projects as well. One thing that I cannot get to work is the static checking when referencing the assembly (which has ccs defined) instead of referencing the project (which has ccs defined).

The runtime checking works fine in both scenarios, but the static checking does not pick up the ccs. Have you had that issue?
